Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Falsches Produkt erhalten.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Please relay this message to the customer.

Dear Benedict,
You have returned the wrong item back to us. The item that we have received has the IMEI: 357866892223879. However, the item stated in this chat and the one you wish to return has the IMEI: 354980614215304. Please return the correct device, that of IMEI: 354980614215304, so that we can do the necessary actions. Thank you.

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

We are going to return the device that we have received to the customer, attached is the photo of the device that we have recevied. Kindly ask the customer to confirm the following address:

Benedict Füllberg
Limbachstraße 21

Germany

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Falsches Produkt erhalten.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

It seems that the customer may have opened the wrong SAV ticket. We received a phone of IMEI 357866892223879. This IMEI belongs to order 40729380. In order for us to refund the customer, they must open the correct ticket. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

In this case he only needs to open the claims, you don't need to send the device back, right?

Regards,
Antonio from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Yes correct. If the customer is able to open the correct conversation then we do not need to return the device. Thanks!

Regards,
RK
